title: Gnar to bar: Handup x Pabst Blue Ribbon collection, no mullet required
content:
Wanna ride hard and party hardy? Handup’s got you covered with its new PBR collab. Pop the top on the collection of jerseys, gloves, coozies and socks that celebrate the brand’s “Great Gear, Better Times” motto. Floral print and a pattern with skulls, red frosty mugs, hops and barley are on tap. Kick back and […]

The post Gnar to bar: Handup x Pabst Blue Ribbon collection, no mullet required appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
